trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> event to customize the appearance of nodes in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>evento para personalizar a aparência de nós em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle usando o desenho do proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> event is raised by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> and a node is displayed or updated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>é gerado por um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlar quando seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>e um nó é exibido ou atualizado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>

trans-unit.source: The DrawTreeNodeEventArgs passed to the event handler contains information about the node to draw as well as providing methods to help you draw the node.
trans-unit.target: O DrawTreeNodeEventArgs passado para o manipulador de eventos contém informações sobre o nó para desenhar, bem como o fornecimento de métodos para ajudá-lo a desenhar o nó.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A> properties to retrieve information about the node to draw.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A>Propriedades para recuperar informações sobre o nó para desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Graphics%2A>fazer o desenho real dentro da área especificada pela propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: To make the operating system draw a node that does not need to be owner drawn, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer com que o sistema operacional desenhar um nó que não precisa ser desenhados pelo proprietário, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>, the area indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property includes the label portion of the node only.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>estiver definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>, a área indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade inclui a parte do rótulo do nó somente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> area includes the entire node, including the area typically used for icons, checkboxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>estiver definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A>área inclui o nó inteiro, incluindo a área usada normalmente para ícones, caixas de seleção, adição e subtração sinais e linhas que conectam os nós.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> superfície na qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> within which to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> no qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeStates"> </xref> valores que indica o estado atual do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho e local do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: O local especificado por essa propriedade é em relação ao canto superior esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>, the area specified by the Bounds property is the region in which a node can be clicked to select it.
trans-unit.target: Quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é definida, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>a área especificada pela propriedade limites é a região em que um nó pode ser clicado para selecionar um proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you draw outside this hit test region, you should provide your own code for selecting a node when its visible area is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Se você desenhar esta região de teste de clique, você deve fornecer seu próprio código para selecionar um nó quando a área visível é clicada.

trans-unit.source: You may also want to provide your own hit test code when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.
trans-unit.target: Você também deseja fornecer seu próprio teste de clique de código quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this mode, the Bounds property encompasses the whole node across the entire width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control, rather than the just hit test region.
trans-unit.target: Nesse modo, a propriedade dos limites engloba todo nó em toda a largura do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlar, em vez de região de teste de clique apenas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> should be drawn by the operating system rather than being owner drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> devem ser desenhadas pelo sistema operacional em vez de ser desenhados pelo proprietário.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` for nodes that you do not want to customize when you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> event.
trans-unit.target: Defina essa propriedade como `true` para nós que não deseja personalizar ao manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, this is useful when you want to customize only nodes that are in a specific state.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, isso é útil quando você deseja personalizar somente nós que estão em um estado específico.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the node should be drawn by the operating system; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the node will be drawn in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó deve ser desenhado pelo sistema operacional; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o nó será desenhado no manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto usado para desenhar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe fornece propriedades e métodos úteis para o dispositivo de vídeo de desenho.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objeto ao desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A> property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>propriedade não fornece informações suficientes para atender às suas necessidades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A> property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether a node is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>propriedade fornece somente as informações de estado básica que você pode usar, por exemplo, para determinar se um nó é selecionado, marcado ou focalizado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Node property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade do nó, por outro lado, permite acessar todos os membros de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You must access the node directly, for example, when you want to determine its expansion state.
trans-unit.target: Você deve acessar o nó diretamente, por exemplo, quando você quiser determinar o estado de expansão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> object to draw is in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objeto ao desenhar está em um estado específico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This property provides only basic state information about the node.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade fornece somente as informações de estado básica sobre o nó.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property, for example, to determine whether a node is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade, por exemplo, para determinar se um nó é selecionado, marcado ou focalizado.

trans-unit.source: If you need to know more, retrieve the node through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisa saber mais, recuperar o nó por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to determine whether the node is expanded, you must retrieve the node and check the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.IsExpanded%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para determinar se o nó é expandido, você deve recuperar o nó e verifique o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.IsExpanded%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.IsExpanded%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeStates"> </xref> valores que indica o estado atual do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.
